mapper.sql:
/*com.ncomz.nms.dao.admin.project.ProjectMapper.projectList*/ SELECT CASE WHEN P.CHECK_YN = 1 THEN '신규' ELSE '추가' END AS CHECK_YN , P.PJT_NO , P.PJT_NAME , P.CUST_NM , P.PM_NM , A.DTL_CD_DESC AS DEPT_CD , CASE WHEN P.CONT_YN = 1 THEN 'YES' ELSE 'NO' END AS CONT_YN , CASE WHEN P.USE_YN = 1 THEN 'Active' ELSE 'Close' END AS USE_YN , DATE_FORMAT(P.STRT_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS STRT_DT , DATE_FORMAT(P.END_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS END_DT , CASE WHEN P.ETC_YN = 1 THEN '개발' ELSE '유지보수' END AS ETC_YN FROM T_COMMON_CODE A , T_PROJECT_INFO P LEFT JOIN T_COMMON_CODE E ON P.TEAM_CD = E.DTL_CD WHERE P.DEPT_CD = A.DTL_CD
ORDER BY P.STRT_DT DESC LIMIT 18446744073709551615
mapper.select: /*com.ncomz.nms.dao.admin.project.ProjectMapper.getProjectListCount*/ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T_COMMON_CODE A , T_PROJECT_INFO P LEFT JOIN T_COMMON_CODE E ON P.team_cd = E.dtl_cd WHERE P.DEPT_CD = A.DTL_CD

/*com.ncomz.nms.dao.admin.project.ProjectMapper.getProjectInfo*/ SELECT P.CHECK_YN , P.PJT_NO , P.PJT_TYPE_CD , P.PJT_NAME , P.CUST_NM , P.PM_NM , P.DEPT_CD , P.TEAM_CD , P.CONT_YN , P.USE_YN , P.STRT_DT , P.END_DT , P.ETC_YN FROM T_PROJECT_INFO P WHERE PJT_NO = #{pjt_no}

/*com.ncomz.nms.dao.admin.project.ProjectMapper.getMemberInfo*/ SELECT PU.PJT_NO , PU.EMP_NO , U.USR_NM , ( SELECT DTL_CD_DESC FROM T_COMMON_CODE WHERE DTL_CD = CO.RANK_CD ) AS RANK_CD , DATE_FORMAT(PU.STRT_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS STRT_DT , DATE_FORMAT(PU.END_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS END_DT , PU.WORK_DT , PU.WORK_ECT FROM T_PROJECT_USER_INFO PU, T_USER U, T_COM_INFO CO WHERE PU.PJT_NO = #{pjt_no} AND PU.EMP_NO = U.EMP_NO AND U.EMP_NO = CO.EMP_NO ORDER BY CO.RANK_CD ASC

/*com.ncomz.nms.dao.admin.project.ProjectMapper.memberview*/ SELECT U.EMP_NO , U.USR_NM , ( SELECT DTL_CD_DESC FROM T_COMMON_CODE WHERE DTL_CD = CO.DEPT_CD ) AS DEPT_CD , ( SELECT DTL_CD_DESC FROM T_COMMON_CODE WHERE DTL_CD = CO.TEAM_CD ) AS TEAM_CD , ( SELECT DTL_CD_DESC FROM T_COMMON_CODE WHERE DTL_CD = CO.RANK_CD ) AS RANK_CD FROM T_USER U, T_COM_INFO CO LEFT OUTER JOIN T_COMMON_CODE E ON CO.PSIT_CD=E.DTL_CD WHERE U.EMP_NO = CO.EMP_NO AND CO.DEPT_CD = #{param_dept_cd} AND CO.TEAM_CD = #{param_team_cd} ORDER BY E.ALGN_ORD, U.EMP_NO;

/*com.ncomz.nms.dao.admin.project.ProjectMapper.getProjectListExcel*/ SELECT CASE WHEN P.CHECK_YN = 1 THEN '신규' ELSE '추가' END AS label_project_checkyn , P.PJT_NO AS label_project_pjtno , P.PJT_NAME AS label_project_pjtname , P.CUST_NM AS label_project_custnm , P.PM_NM AS label_project_pmnm , A.DTL_CD_DESC AS label_project_dept , CASE WHEN P.CONT_YN = 1 THEN 'YES' ELSE 'NO' END AS label_project_contyn , CASE WHEN P.USE_YN = 1 THEN 'Active' ELSE 'Close' END AS label_project_useyn , DATE_FORMAT(P.STRT_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS label_project_strtdt , DATE_FORMAT(P.END_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS label_project_enddt , CASE WHEN P.ETC_YN = 1 THEN '개발' ELSE '유지보수' END AS label_project_etcyn FROM T_COMMON_CODE A , T_PROJECT_INFO P WHERE P.DEPT_CD = A.DTL_CD
ORDER BY P.STRT_DT DESC
